Zsh

- user-friendly POSIX-compliant interactive command interpreter (shell).

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

Installation

  • Debian:

    # apt install -y ?

  • Void:

    # xbps-install -y ?

Configuration

  1. Zsh config file:
    ~/.zshrc
    ## AUTHOR:       AISK11
## LOCATION:     ~/.zshrc (0644 <USER>:<USER>)
## DEPENDENCIES: ?
## DESCRIPTION:  Zsh config file.
